name: Scire
description:
Scire takes place in the world of the subconscious, you have only one task: Get to the exit, overcoming obstacles and traps, in order to fulfill your goal once you wake up. There is only one problem, there is an annoying enemy that makes our way difficult, who is that annoying person? Play to find out!

Los Perros Mamados :
